keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing a hard Tory Brexit, prioritising jobs and the economy, fighting for a strong NHS and social care, campaigning for real standards in schools, opposing grammar school vanity projects, standing up for local jobs and services, representing working people not millionaires.
Helen will continue the fight to protect accident and emergency services at Warrington Hospital.
Helen is fighting for all children to have a good local school and real standards to help them achieve - not for grammar school vanity projects favoured by the Tories.

mentions.candidate: Helen has been taking up YOUR issues both locally and nationally.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposing a hard Tory Brexit, prioritising jobs and the economy.
issues.economy: Opposing a hard Tory Brexit, prioritising jobs and the economy.
issues.education: Campaigning for real standards in schools, opposing grammar school vanity projects.
issues.health: Helen will continue the fight to protect accident and emergency services at Warrington Hospital.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helen has driven improvements in bus services, campaigned on issues such as hospital services, supported local industry and been an advocate for those needing help with housing or immigration.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote Labour to put Warrington North first.
